Package Model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
Model.Board
public class Board extends Object
This class is the board of the game, which contains an ArrayList of Tiles
Version:
1.0
Author:
csd4623

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Board()
    constructor: Constructs a new Board which contains:
    1 StartTile (Always the first tile) 1 PaydayTile (Always the last tile) 8 MessageTiles(4 of each type)(Random Position) 5 DealTiles (Random Position) 2 SweepStakesTiles (Random Position) 3 LotteryTiles (Random Position) 2 RadioTiles (Random Position) 6 BuyerTiles (Random Position) 2 FamilyCasinoTiles (Random Position) 2 YardSaleTiles (Random Position) postcondition: Creates and initializes the board of the game

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ArrayList<Tile>
    getBoard()
    Accessor: Returns the ArrayList that contains all the Tiles Postcondition: The Tile is returned
    Tile
    getClosestDealBuyer​(Tile startingTile)
    Accessor: Returns the Tile that is closest to the startingTile and is also a Deal or Buyer Tile Precondition: 0<=startingTile.getOrderNumber()<=32 Postcondition: The Tile is returned
    Tile
    getTile​(int i)
    Accessor: Returns the Tile that is in the i-th position of the ArrayList Precondition: 0<=i<=32 Postcondition: The Tile is returned
    String
    toString()
    Returns the string representation of the board

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      constructor: Constructs a new Board which contains:
      • 1 StartTile (Always the first tile)
      • 1 PaydayTile (Always the last tile)
      • 8 MessageTiles(4 of each type)(Random Position)
      • 5 DealTiles (Random Position)
      • 2 SweepStakesTiles (Random Position)
      • 3 LotteryTiles (Random Position)
      • 2 RadioTiles (Random Position)
      • 6 BuyerTiles (Random Position)
      • 2 FamilyCasinoTiles (Random Position)
      • 2 YardSaleTiles (Random Position)
      postcondition: Creates and initializes the board of the game

  • Method Details

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile​(int i)
      Accessor: Returns the Tile that is in the i-th position of the ArrayList Precondition: 0<=i<=32 Postcondition: The Tile is returned
      Parameters:
      i - number i Tile will be returned
      Returns:
      i-th Tile of the ArrayList

    • getBoard

      public ArrayList<Tile> getBoard()
      Accessor: Returns the ArrayList that contains all the Tiles Postcondition: The Tile is returned
      Returns:
      board-the entire board (ArrayList of Tiles)

    • getClosestDealBuyer

      public Tile getClosestDealBuyer​(Tile startingTile)
      Accessor: Returns the Tile that is closest to the startingTile and is also a Deal or Buyer Tile Precondition: 0<=startingTile.getOrderNumber()<=32 Postcondition: The Tile is returned
      Parameters:
      startingTile - The tile the player is currently on
      Returns:
      Tile that is closest to the startingTile and is also a Deal or Buyer Tile
